verses.name: John 8:44
verses.text: Ye are of your father the devil, and the lusts of your father ye will do. He was a murderer from the beginning, and abode not in the truth, because there is no truth in him. When he speaketh a lie, he speaketh of his own: for he is a liar, and the father of it.

verses.name: John 8:45
verses.text: And because I tell you the truth, ye believe me not.

verses.name: John 8:46
verses.text: Which of you convinceth me of sin? And if I say the truth, why do ye not believe me?
